News

Royalty Cheques

(12/09/2014)

Royalty cheques will be issued on Friday, December 12th, starting at 10:00 am until 8:00 pm at the Training Centre.

If you want to pick up another person’s cheque, you will need to have a written authorization from that person.

Thank you,
Chief and Council

Wulastukw Elementary Welcome Back Letter

(09/13/2014)

Click here to view Wulastukw Elementary’s welcome back letter for September 2014.

FNREEES iPad Winner

(09/09/2014)

First Nation Regional Employment, Education and Early Childhood Survey (FNREEES) iPad Winner! Congratulations to Alice Sheppard of Kingsclear First Nation who was the winner of the FNREEES iPAD Mini! Presenting Alice with the iPad are Chief Gabby Atwin (left) and Kingsclear FNREEES Fieldworker Teddy Polchies (right).
